channel.title: Saddam to be hung? discuss
channel.description: What you think about the descision to give saddam the death penalty? was it the right discision? i dont think so, i think they should have kept him locked up for life.. but meh what would you choose? keep him in jail, or send him off to hell?

item.title: Saddam to be hung? discuss
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

[quote=“Exernet, post:11, topic:22259”]This is the 21st century idiot, the US doesn’t hang people.

He’ll get lethal injection or life imprisonment.[/quote]
He was tried in Iraq, the US doesn’t pick his punishment.

Read full topic

item.title: Saddam to be hung? discuss
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

[quote=“Exernet, post:24, topic:22259”][quote author=bigmac link=topic=34011.msg409099#msg409099 date=1162779459]

This is the 21st century idiot, the US doesn’t hang people.

He’ll get lethal injection or life imprisonment.

You seem to be so wrong…
Today it was said officialy in 2 months time he will be hanged.
[/quote]

Ah this is news to me, I didn’t know he was actually convicted already.

I’m actually really surprised he’s going to be hung.[/quote]

exernet you dissapoint me. You usually have the answer to everything, you have proved to me that you are a human and not a robot…

Read full topic

item.title: Saddam to be hung? discuss
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

I know he’s done ALOT of wrong. Ok, more than that. But, I don’t think he should be hanged.
You have to put yourself into other peoples shoes. What actually drives someone to become a crazy pshcopathic killer? Clearly if he had been brought up in different circumstances, he wouldn’t have turned out the same. I say hang his parents

Read full topic

Also cut off his balls and make him eat them.[/quote]
You sound like you rose from hell(if ur crischian,sry for spelling, or any other religion that has that)
Be a human!torture-worse than death itself.
To be honest I think they should let him live,keep him locked up,to prevent more trouble(same for Bush, lol) but killing a person in any way just doesn’t seem right(not that any1 can stop murders in the world…)

item.title: Saddam to be hung? discuss
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

I don’t believe Saddam should be hung at all. Why? Because I’m a Sunni

KIDDING!

The real reason I don’t want Saddam hung is that I don’t think its an adequate punishement for all the horrors he has committed. If I was in his shoes I would fear Isolation (A dark room with a bed and a toilet) until death without parole over the death penalty. Death = A prick of pain from the Injection. 30 mins and you sleep forever. Isolation = Held in a dark room for all your life never seeing sunlight or have any entertainment, That is HELL, I would got insane (even more than now) if I got Lifelong Isolation.

Read full topic
